Header: Relief for the damages caused to crops by Senaa Caterpillar
Content: The Government has taken steps to provide relief to the farmers for the damages caused to crops by Senaa Caterpillar. Minister P. Harrison said the Ministry of Agriculture has allocated 50 million rupees to pay compensation for the damages to the crops by Senaa Caterpillar. Maize and sugar-cane cultivations in Anuradhapura, Ampara and Monaragala areas were severely damaged by the Senaa Caterpillar. Minister P. Harrison made an observation tour of Anuradhapura, Nachchaduwa area to look into the destruction caused by the Caterpillar
